nodes.text: A battle occurred on the moon Yavin 4 in the aftermath of the Battle of Rishi during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. The battle saw a coalition of Imperial and Republic forces, under the command of Darth Marr and Satele Shan, join together to combat the Order of Revan and their leader Revan, who sought to restore the Sith Emperor to a physical form in order to permanently defeat him. Revan's plans were stopped, but the Emperor regained his strength nonetheless and vanished from the moon.
